facet_1.name: Fresh Meat
facet_1.effects: Dismember grants self bonus strength per damage instance applied to enemy heroes.

facet_2.name: Rotten Core
facet_2.effects: While Rot is active, Pudge gains bonus attack damage every second until it reaches the maximum bonus. Once Rot is deactivated, damage bonus rapidly decays.

effects: Increases the effect radius and damage per second
When activated, Rot reduces the values of health restoration sources of all affected enemy units within the radius
Deals additional damage to enemies depending on the distance of the target
Has a shorter cooldown when pulling allies

level_25: +1.5x Flesh Heap Strength Bonus, +1.5x Meat Shield Damage Negation

abilities.name: Flesh Heap
abilities.description: Grants bonus strength whenever Pudge kills an enemy Hero or when an enemy hero dies within his vicinity.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Dismember. Grants a stack if the enemy hero kill is credited to him, regardless of distance.

abilities.name: Hero Model
abilities.description: Pudge's hero model has the following hidden innate abilities. He may only perform or utilize the ability's functions upon a successful channeling.
abilities.details: Contains hidden innate abilities that require channeling to activate.

ability_1.name: Meat Hook
ability_1.details: Max Travel Distance: 1300, Damage: 150/220/290/360 (300/370/440/510), Followthrough Duration: 0.53, Hook Search Radius: 100
ability_1.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage.
technical_details: The hook instantly kills non-ancient creeps it snags
The hook refunds the ability mana cost when it snags a rune
Aghanim's Shard: Deals additional damage to enemies depending on distance, shorter cooldown when pulling allies
interaction_notes: Can travel through impassable terrain and trees
Does not affect ancient creeps, invulnerable units, or hidden units

ability_2.name: Rot
ability_2.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement â€” harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

facet_effects.rotten_core: Attack Damage Bonus Growth per Second: 4%/8%/12%/16%, Max Attack Damage Bonus: 20%/40%/60%/80%, Decay Duration: 1

technical_details: Creates a negative aura that deals damage in 0.2-second intervals
Does not interrupt channeling abilities when toggled
interaction_notes: Continues to apply effects when disabled
Aghanim's Scepter increases radius and adds health restoration reduction

ability_3.name: Meat Shield
ability_3.description: Negates all damage types from all sources while active.
technical_details: Damage negation procs after all reductions
Does not interrupt channeling abilities upon cast
interaction_notes: Does not negate damage on units affected by damage barrier sources

ability_4.name: Dismember
ability_4.details: Pull Distance per Second: 75, Pull Distance Threshold: 125, Max Channel Time: 2.75 (3.5), Number of Intervals: 6 (8), Base Damage per Second: 80/100/120 (120/150/180), Str as Damage Factor: 0.3/0.6/0.9 (0.45/0.9/1.35), Damage to Self-Heal Factor: 1
ability_4.description: Chows down on an enemy unit. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate up to a certain minimum distance.

facet_effects.fresh_meat: Str Bonus per Damage Instance: 2/4/6, Duration: 12

technical_details: Disables and pulls the target toward Pudge
Grants True Sight over the affected unit
Fresh Meat facet grants temporary strength bonus per damage instance
interaction_notes: Channeling interrupted by hidden or invulnerable sources on target
Invisible sources on target do not interrupt channeling

changes: Aghanim's Scepter upgrade: Rot now follows the health restoration mechanic
REMOVED the Meat Hook Flayer's Hook facet
ADDED the Rotten Core facet for Rot
Grants 4%/8%/12%/16% attack damage bonus per stack per second when toggled, up to 20%/40%/60%/80% max bonus attack damage after 5 seconds
The attack damage bonus has a 1-second decay duration upon toggling off
Increased Dismember Fresh Meat self strength bonus per damage instance from 1/3/5 to 2/4/6
REWORKED Aghanim's Shard upgrade for Meat Hook
Deals 0.2 * PullDistance as enemy spell damage bonus
Applies a 0.5 * CurrentCD when the projectile hits an allied unit
Reduced Flesh Heap strength bonus per stack from 1.4/1.6/1.8/2 to 1.1/1.4/1.7/2
Reduced Meat Hook Flayer's Hook projectile speed factor from 1.15 to 1
Reduced Meat Shield duration from 5/6/7/8 to 4/5/6/7
Talents: LVL 10 +15% Rot movement speed slow reduced to +10%
